scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a land grant, June 1714, to Francis Clements(d. 1717) for 516 acres in Surry County, Virginia, signed by Alexander Spotswood, Governor of the Virginia Colony, and typed genealogical material concerning Francis Clementsand his descendants (see genealogical trays under Clements).
